

192.168.59.48/29


               192.168.59.48 = 11000000.10101000.00111011.00110000
        /29= 255.255.255.248 = 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111000


11000000.10101000.00111011.00110 000
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111 000



Network Address:
11000000.10101000.00111011.00110 000=  192.168.59.48 




29 - 24(Class c) => 5 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^5 => 32

Number of host bits remaining available => 8(default) - 5(subnetbits) => 3bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^3)-2 => 8-2=> 6

Firt Host Address =>11000000.10101000.00111011.00110 001=>192.168.59.49

Last Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00111011.00110 110=> 192.168.59.54

Previous Subnet Address:
11000000.10101000.00111011.00101 000 => 192.168.59.40

Next Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00111011.00111 000 => 192.168.59.56


Broadcast Address:

11000000.10101000.00111011.00110 111=> 192.168.59.55

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP) address:
11000000.10101000.00111011.00101111=> 192.168.59.47


Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address:
10101100.00010011.00010011.00110001 => 192.168.59.49
